title: Johnson 'cautiously optimistic' as leaders leave COP26

title: More than 100 nations vow to slash methane levels
content: The Global Methane Pledge aims to cut methane emissions by 30% by 2030, compared with 2020 levels.

title: Citizens urged to defend Ethiopia's capital
content: Addis Ababa residents are told to register weapons and protect areas as rebels advance.

title: Bezos pledges $2bn for restoring nature
content: Amazon founder Jeff Bezos tells the COP26 climate meeting he was inspired by his recent space trip.

title: Fury at Auschwitz tattoo stamp sale in Jerusalem
content: Tools used to brand inmates at the Nazi death camp are being auctioned, angering Jewish leaders.

title: Cheeky parrot plays peekaboo with traffic camera
content: A turquoise-fronted amazon parrot was captured investigating a CCTV camera in Curitiba, Brazil.

title: World leaders promise to end deforestation by 2030
content: More than 100 nations - including Brazil, Russia and Indonesia - sign COP26's first major deal.

title: DiCaprio brings star power to Glasgow for COP26
content: The actor and UN climate change representative is mobbed by fans and journalists on arrival.

title: Abortion law protests over death of Polish woman
content: A family's lawyer links the death of a 30-year-old mother to tighter abortion laws.

title: Deal struck to turbo charge green technology
content: Countries that will sign the pledge cover more than 70% of the world's economy.

title: Ex-football chiefs Blatter and Platini charged
content: Sepp Blatter and Michel Platini, former world and European football heads, are charged with fraud.

title: More than 20 killed in Kabul hospital attack
